pgrid.network
Interface RemoteMessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ACKDispatcher, GenericManager, MaintenanceMessagesDispatcher, NaFTMessagesDispatcher, RemoteDistributionHandler, RemoteLookupHandler, RemoteReplicationHandler, RemoteSearchHandler
public interface RemoteMessageHandler

All manager willing to handle message reveived from the network should implement this interface

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Renault John

Method Summary
 void failedToRoute(PGridMessage msg)
          This method is called when the router is unable to route further a message.
 void newRemoteMessage(PGridMessage msg, boolean broadcasted)
          This method is called when a new message arrives.
 

Method Detail

newRemoteMessage

void newRemoteMessage(PGridMessage msg,
                      boolean broadcasted)
This method is called when a new message arrives. When a message is broadcasted, it is NOT ensure that the local host is really responsible for this message.

Parameters:
msg - received message
broadcasted - true if message was broadcaseted.

failedToRoute

void failedToRoute(PGridMessage msg)
This method is called when the router is unable to route further a message. The routing behavior is left to the application layer.

Parameters:
msg -
